objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD IBM-NetFinity-Text-Alert-MIB::trapText1 IBM-NetFinity-Text-Alert-MIB::trapDesc1 s EXAMPLE IBM-NetFinity-Text-Alert-MIB::trapSystemName s EXAMPLE IBM-NetFinity-Text-Alert-MIB::trapTime s EXAMPLE IBM-NetFinity-Text-Alert-MIB::trapDate s EXAMPLE IBM-NetFinity-Text-Alert-MIB::trapSeverity i 9999 IBM-NetFinity-Text-Alert-MIB::trapType s EXAMPLE IBM-NetFinity-Text-Alert-MIB::trapApplicationID s EXAMPLE IBM-NetFinity-Text-Alert-MIB::trapAppType i 9999 IBM-NetFinity-Text-Alert-MIB::trapRecFrom s EXAMPLE

description: The text of the Netfinity generated alert
